title: Repair Kathmandu-Thankot Highway Landslide Damage
description: The 14km stretch from Thankot to Naubise has 7 active landslide zones making daily commute dangerous. We demand immediate repair and installation of retaining walls before monsoon season worsens conditions.

title: Clean Drinking Water for Rukum East Villages
description: Over 23 remote villages in Rukum East lack access to clean piped water. Women walk 4+ hours daily to fetch water from contaminated sources. Immediate pipeline extension is urgently needed.

title: Establish Polytechnic College in Dang
description: Dang has no technical/vocational college within 100km. Youth are forced to migrate or remain unemployed. We demand the government establish a polytechnic institute to address local skill shortages.

title: Ban Plastic Bags in Pokhara Tourist Zone
description: Lakeside and surrounding trekking trails are being choked by single-use plastic. We urge Pokhara Metropolitan to enforce an immediate ban with biodegradable alternatives supplied to vendors.

title: 24-Hour Emergency Ward at Dhading District Hospital
description: Dhading District Hospital closes its emergency ward at 6PM daily, forcing critical patients on 3+ hour transfers to Kathmandu. We demand 24/7 emergency staffing and basic ICU equipment.

title: Stop Industrial Waste Dumping into Bagmati River
description: Multiple factories in Balaju are directly discharging toxic wastewater into the Bagmati. This is violating existing environmental laws. Immediate shutdown orders and fines must be enforced.

title: Fix Biratnagar Ring Road Potholes
description: The ring road connecting Biratnagar's industrial area has deteriorated to unusable condition, damaging goods vehicles and causing accidents. Immediate resurfacing is needed before further economic loss.

title: Internet Connectivity for Humla District Schools
description: All 47 government schools in Humla have zero internet access. Modern curriculum requires digital tools. Satellite internet installation via the Digital Nepal Framework must be prioritized for this district.

title: Repeal Controversial Media Bill Amendment
description: The proposed amendment to the Media Act restricts online journalism and punishes political commentary. We demand the amendment be withdrawn to protect press freedom as guaranteed by the Constitution.

title: Irrigation Canal for Sarlahi Farmlands
description: Over 12,000 hectares of fertile farmland in Sarlahi remain unirrigated. A simple canal extension from the Bagmati Irrigation Project can service these areas. Farmers are facing repeated crop failures.

title: Ambulance Service for Mugu District
description: Mugu has no road-connected ambulance service. Pregnant women and emergency patients are carried on stretchers for days. A helicopter-ambulance arrangement or fast-track road must be prioritized.

title: Strengthen Anti-Corruption Law for Public Officials
description: Current penalties for corruption by public servants are insufficient deterrents. We demand legislation mandating asset forfeiture, minimum 5-year sentences, and independent prosecution for cases above NPR 1 crore.

title: Rebuild Sindhupalchok Earthquake Damaged Schools
description: 127 school buildings damaged in the 2023 earthquake remain unrebuilt. Students attend classes in makeshift tarpaulin shelters. Reconstruction funds were allocated but progress is zero.

title: No New Cement Industry License Near Chitwan National Park
description: Two proposed cement plants near the park buffer zone will devastate elephant corridors and pollute the Rapti River. We demand an immediate halt to new industrial licensing within 10km of the park boundary.

title: Free Mental Health Services at Community Hospitals
description: Nepal has 1 psychiatrist per 300,000 people. Community hospitals must be mandated to provide at least one counseling session per week. Mental health is a public health emergency.
